settings.heading: How To Use?
settings.content:
For optimal use of LVRG Metamix, simply mix one scoop with 8-12 ounces of water, or your preferred beverage, each morning or early in the afternoon.

This ensures you harness the full benefits of the supplement during your most active hours.

settings.text: All Day |Natural Energy & Focus| Without Caffiene
Ditch the temporary caffeine highs and inevitable crashes. Discover Metamix®—a natural blend of greens, mushrooms, and adaptogens for sustained energy and focus without the side effects.
All Day |Natural Energy & Focus| Without Caffiene

Most of us lean on caffeine to kickstart our day, only to hit a wall by afternoon. The energy dips, the focus fades, and the jitters kick in, leaving us searching for more. It's a cycle that's hard to break and hard on your body.
The Ultimate Way To Get |In The Zone| Physically and Mentally

While others offer quick fixes, Metamix® focuses on your long-term well-being. Our scientifically backed formula supports gut health, optimizes hormones, and delivers essential nutrients, ensuring not just all-day energy but a foundation for overall health.
✔ Ingredients Selected for Mental Clarity and Focus
✔ Formulated to Support Daily Energy and Drive

settings.heading: Veggie Deficit
settings.text: 80% of Men Fall Short on Veggies. It's more than health; it's about maintaining that masculine edge.

settings.heading: Hidden Estrogen Boosters
settings.text: Beware of Common Greens: They're often packed with soy, alfalfa, and flaxseed – sneaky estrogen boosters.

settings.heading: Benefits Of Metamix
settings.text_left1: Stay effortlessly in the zone. Metamix fuels your mental clarity, enabling peak concentration and productivity without the fog.
settings.text_left2: Power through your day, every day. Experience a surge of clean, natural energy that keeps you going strong, without any jitters.
settings.text_right1: Support your gut health with our prebiotic and probiotic-rich formula for smoother digestion and absorption.
settings.text_right2: Harness the power of adaptogens for optimal hormone health. Feel stronger, more balanced, and ready for anything

settings.textcard: As soon as you consume LVRG Metamix, the nutrients begin to absorb into your bloodstream. Organic greens and adaptogens start working to balance and energize your body.
Within a day, ingredients like Lion's Mane and Bacopa Monnieri begin to support brain function, potentially enhancing focus and mental clarity.
With regular intake, adaptogens like Ashwagandha and Rhodiola Rosea start to modulate your stress response, leading to improved resilience and mood.
The Probiotic and Prebiotic Blend begins to positively influence your gut health, aiding in digestion and nutrient absorption.
A month into your routine, the benefits of Beetroot Powder and Cordyceps become more evident, potentially enhancing your physical endurance and recovery.

Balanced Hormonal Health
After two months, ingredients like Fenugreek and the absence of estrogenic compounds contribute to maintaining a healthy hormonal balance, crucial for men's health.

settings.secheading: Use Metamix Daily and You Will Begin To See

settings.heading: Man-to-Man Guarantee
settings.text: Gentlemen, at LVRG, we don't mince words. Dive into a bag of our blend, put it to the test. If you're not feeling the LVRG difference, shoot us an email at support@uselvrg.com and we'll refund you, no returns necessary.

settings.heading: What Benefits can I expect?
settings.content: Metamix is designed to be more than just a supplement — it's a holistic approach to daily well-being. You can look forward to a blend that supports your journey towards enhanced daily vitality, contributing to a sense of improved energy and mental clarity. It's crafted to complement your wellness routine, offering a nutritional boost that aligns with your lifestyle.

settings.heading: WHY SHOULD I CHOOSE METAMIX OVER ENERGY DRINKS?
settings.content: Energy drinks? Those fleeting boosts? Mushroom-Greens Metamix is a sustainable power source, without the crash. Plus, it's packed with nature's best, sans the artificial junk.

settings.heading: How much should I take daily?
settings.content: One scoop, and you're set. Blend it, shake it, drink it. Daily.

settings.heading: IS THE METAMIX ORGANIC?
settings.content: Every bit of it. Pure, organic, and clean.

settings.heading: Can women use it?
settings.content: While crafted with men in mind, it's beneficial for everyone. So, ladies, feel free to dive in.

settings.heading: WHAT INSPIRED THE CREATION OF THIS METAMIX?
settings.content: A desire to cater to the modern man's unique nutritional needs, with no compromises.

settings.heading: CAN IT CAUSE ANY DIGESTIVE DISCOMFORT?
settings.content: While our mix is gentle on most stomachs, always start with a smaller portion to test the waters.

settings.heading: How can I be sure Metamix will work for me?
settings.content: Metamix is thoughtfully formulated with ingredients that are recognized in scientific studies for their contributions to men's wellness. This blend is designed with a focus on supporting mental focus and energy levels, while also considering overall hormonal wellness. While individual experiences can vary, Metamix is crafted to offer noticeable contributions to your daily wellness routine

settings.heading: How quickly will I notice results with Metamix?
settings.content: Some users may start to notice a difference within a few days, while for others, it could take a little longer, possibly a couple of weeks. Consistency is important when using Metamix, as regular use can contribute to experiencing its full potential benefits. Remember, individual responses can vary, and it's always beneficial to maintain a balanced lifestyle alongside any supplement regimen.

settings.heading: How much does shipping cost and when will I receive my order?
settings.content: Shipping costs vary based on your location and selected shipping speed. Our standard processing time is same day or 1-2 business days after placing your order (For holidays). For exact shipping prices, complete the checkout process with your shipping information, and available carriers and prices for your location will be provided.
